landing.heroSubtitle: Organize your photos, thoughts, and memories in beautiful boards and share them with your loved ones.

boards.title: Custom Boards
boards.description: Organize your memories by themes. Add custom cover photos and descriptions for each board.

memories.title: Preserve Memories
memories.description: Upload your photos, add comments, and make your special moments permanent.

sharing.title: Sharing & Discovery
sharing.description: Share your boards with others and get inspired by the community. Discover other users' boards.
